ProjectTitle: Exploring the use of isotopomers in tracer metabolomics to understand the activity and connectivity of biochemical pathways.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
19/04/2024
Metadata: will your instruments generate metadata with Mass Spectrometry? For more information about documentation and metadata see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Sharing: if there are no factors restricting sharing, why will you share data with restricted access? Are there repositories specific for MS that are more suitable for your data? see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing and https://www.re3data.org/.
label: good with suggestions
